title: CU Sailing Club Fund
description: To provide support for activities of the Sailing Club at the University of Colorado Boulder, incl. replacement of the CU Sailing Club's fleet boats to practice more efficiently and sail with other teams.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Sailing Club at the University of Colorado Boulder. Support includes replacement of the CU Sailing Club's fleet boats in order to practice more efficiently and to be able to sail with other teams.
